channel.title: How do I make items stackable?
channel.description: How do I make items stackable in a 317.

item.title: How do I make items stackable?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Item class.

Should see something like

[code] try {
FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(
new File(“data/stackable.dat”));

        while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
            if (c == 0) {
                itemStackable[counter] = false;
            } else {
                itemStackable[counter] = true;
            }
            counter++;
        }
        dataIn.close();
                   itemStackable[6570] = false;[/code]

You probably won’t have

itemStackable[6570] = false;

But, if you wanted an item to be stackable:

itemStackable[####] = true;

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make items stackable?
